Articles.Content:
Hello!

It would be a great idea, in my opinion, to add a memorial wall to the astronaut complex. It would be great to have a wall that gives a star (or other symbol) in honor of a Kerbonaut that has passed or is considered missing in action.

Well... in some case wall can be small to some people .. im pretty sure about it ... Kerbals missing are listed in astronaut complex so .. thats where they memory belong ... for more honor and roleplay action there is allways some kind of mod .. like https://kerbal.curseforge.com/projects/eterno-rest-2000-space-coffin-continued

Edited February 7, 2017 by REMD

I'd like to see a memorial wall as well.

Perhaps it would be part of upgrading the Astronaut Complex?
Something like XCOM:EU memorial - showing xp, accomplishments, place and vehicle of death.
